epics.title: Task Management Core Functionality
epics.description: Develop the core functionality for managing tasks, including adding, editing, marking as completed, deleting, and displaying tasks. This epic is critical as it delivers the primary value proposition of the application: enabling users to manage their daily to-do items efficiently.

stories.title: Add New Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.

subtasks.title: Design Add Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI components for task input fields and add button, ensuring accessibility and responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Implement logic to capture user input and trigger task creation.

subtasks.title: Implement Add Task API
subtasks.description: Develop backend endpoint to accept new task data and store it in the database.

subtasks.title: Test Add Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases to verify task addition works as expected.

stories.title: Edit Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to edit an existing task's title and description so that I can update my tasks as needed.

subtasks.title: Design Edit Task UI
subtasks.description: Create UI for editing tasks, including modal or inline editing options.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Implement logic to update task data and handle user input validation.

subtasks.title: Implement Edit Task API
subtasks.description: Develop backend endpoint to update task details in the database.

subtasks.title: Test Edit Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases to verify task editing works as expected.

stories.title: Mark Task as Completed
stories.description: As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so that I can track which tasks are done.

subtasks.title: Design Completed Task UI
subtasks.description: Update UI to visually distinguish completed tasks (e.g., strikethrough, color change).

subtasks.title: Implement Mark as Completed Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Implement logic to toggle task completion status.

subtasks.title: Implement Update Task Status API
subtasks.description: Develop backend endpoint to update task completion status.

subtasks.title: Test Mark as Completed Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed and uncompleted.

stories.title: Delete Task
stories.description: As a user, I want to delete a task so that I can remove tasks I no longer need.

subtasks.title: Design Delete Task UI
subtasks.description: Add delete button and confirmation dialog to task items.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task Logic (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Implement logic to trigger task deletion and update UI.

subtasks.title: Implement Delete Task API
subtasks.description: Develop backend endpoint to delete tasks from the database.

subtasks.title: Test Delete Task Functionality
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for task deletion and confirmation.

stories.title: Display All Tasks in a List
stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a list so that I can easily view and manage them.

subtasks.title: Design Task List UI
subtasks.description: Create responsive UI for displaying tasks in a list format.

subtasks.title: Implement Task List Rendering (Frontend)
subtasks.description: Implement logic to fetch and render tasks from backend.

subtasks.title: Implement Get Tasks API
subtasks.description: Develop backend endpoint to retrieve all tasks from the database.

subtasks.title: Test Task List Display
subtasks.description: Write and execute test cases for displaying tasks and real-time updates.

epics.title: Cross-Platform and Performance Optimization
epics.description: Ensure the application loads within 3 seconds and works seamlessly on both desktop and mobile browsers. This epic is essential to meet technical requirements and provide a smooth user experience.

stories.title: Responsive Design Implementation
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to look and function well on both desktop and mobile devices.

subtasks.title: Design Responsive Layout
subtasks.description: Create responsive layouts using CSS frameworks or media queries.

subtasks.title: Implement Responsive Components
subtasks.description: Update UI components to be mobile-friendly and responsive.

subtasks.title: Test Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Test application on multiple devices and browsers for responsiveness.

stories.title: Performance Optimization
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to load quickly (within 3 seconds) so that I can start managing tasks without delay.

subtasks.title: Optimize Frontend Assets
subtasks.description: Minify and compress CSS, JS, and images.

subtasks.title: Implement Lazy Loading
subtasks.description: Implement lazy loading for non-critical resources.

subtasks.title: Performance Testing
subtasks.description: Test app load times and optimize as needed.

stories.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to work on all major browsers so that I can access it from anywhere.

subtasks.title: Set Up Browser Testing Matrix
subtasks.description: Define and document supported browsers and versions.

subtasks.title: Execute Cross-Browser Tests
subtasks.description: Test app on all supported browsers and log issues.

subtasks.title: Fix Cross-Browser Issues
subtasks.description: Resolve any compatibility issues found during testing.

epics.title: Infrastructure, Deployment, and Quality Assurance
epics.description: Set up the necessary infrastructure, deployment pipelines, and quality assurance processes to ensure the application is robust, maintainable, and easily deployable.

stories.title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
stories.description: As a developer, I want automated build, test, and deployment pipelines so that releases are reliable and repeatable.

subtasks.title: Configure CI/CD Tools
subtasks.description: Set up tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar for automated builds and tests.

subtasks.title: Automate Deployment Scripts
subtasks.description: Write scripts for automated deployment to cloud or hosting provider.

subtasks.title: Document Rollback Procedures
subtasks.description: Create documentation for rolling back deployments in case of failure.

stories.title: Comprehensive QA Testing
stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to ensure the application is thoroughly tested so that users have a bug-free experience.

subtasks.title: Write Test Cases
subtasks.description: Document test cases for all user stories and edge cases.

subtasks.title: Automate Regression Tests
subtasks.description: Implement automated tests for regression coverage.

subtasks.title: Manual Exploratory Testing
subtasks.description: Perform manual exploratory testing for usability and edge cases.

stories.title: Product Documentation and Release Planning
stories.description: As a product manager, I want to provide clear documentation and release notes so that stakeholders are informed and the team is aligned.

subtasks.title: Write User Documentation
subtasks.description: Create user guides and FAQs for the application.

subtasks.title: Prepare Release Notes
subtasks.description: Draft and publish release notes for each deployment.

subtasks.title: Stakeholder Communication
subtasks.description: Notify stakeholders of releases and major updates.
